articles.title: Notre Dame Coaches on the Road - Jan. 18 - 247Sports
articles.description: It’s once again time for the Notre Dame coaches to hit the road. Led by head coach Marcus Freeman, the staff will be all over the country checking in on top targets and potential targets. Here is today’s breakdown.
articles.content: Running backs coach Deland McCullough — After a day in Texas, McCullough is heading to New Orleans, La., to see some top prospects. He’s expected at John F. Kennedy high school to check in on cornerb… [+620 chars]
